examples: Trying to use a variable that hasn't been defined
Attempting to call a method or access an attribute that doesn't exist for a particular object
Passing an argument of an unexpected type to a function

runtime_errors.description: Value with Unexpected Format Passed to the Function
examples: Providing an argument of the correct type but with an inappropriate value
Trying to access an element outside the valid range of an array or list
Attempting to call a function that isn't defined for the object
Attempting to divide a number by zero
Trying to open a file that does not exist
Accessing a dictionary key that does not exist
Failing to import a module or package
Importing a module that cannot be found
An operation that runs out of memory
The result of an arithmetic operation is too large
A function exceeds the maximum recursion depth
